item.title: Marvel Rivals Reveals Fan-Favorite Spider-Punk Suit is Coming to Store Soon
item.content:encoded:

Spider-Punk 2099 Arrives in Marvel Rivals

Marvel Rivals confirmed today that Spider-Man‚Äôs Spider-Punk 2099 suit will make its official debut on March 20th at 2:00 UTC. The skin was one of a few that were playable during the early access tests for the game, such as the President Loki skin just recently officially released. The Spider-Punk character first appeared in The Amazing Spider-Man comic series in 2015, and a version of them appeared in the Spider-Man: Across the Spider-Verse film.

The Spider-Punk 2099 suit will, naturally, be sold as a bundle that will include a suit-specific emote and MVP screen. The bundle will likely include a spray and a player card as well.
